text: The List of Ehime F.C. players is evolving. The history of the team is created by its players. Ehime F.C.FC is an acronym. FC stands for "Footbal Club". In the J-League, the team is one of seven with FC in the club name. is a Japanese professional football clubJsoccer.com, "Japan J.League Teams" ; retrieved 6 July 2012. in Matsuyama.Soccerway.com, "Ehime FC"; retrieved 8 March 2012. ==List== :This list is not finished; you can help Wikipedia by adding to it. * Shuichi AkaiSoccerway.com, "S.
